result.execSummary:
The defendant Timothy A. Grudzielanek was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments, Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant to pay fine, costs and DNA surcharge within 60 days (5/16/16) through the Dodge County Clerk of Courts office or set up a payment plan within said time.
Defendant shall undergo and follow through with any counseling as recommended by Agent.
Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant Timothy A. Grudzielanek in court with attorney Brian Severson. 9:01 - Defendant, Timothy A. Grudzielanek in court, Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. Court enters Not Guilty plea. Address update: 504 S Spring St, Beaver Dam WI. RD & JT set. Court sets $150 Cash bond (as previously posted) with conditions:   Defendant shall not go on the premises at N8595 Sunset Beach Road, BD.   Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with CJG m/w dob 5/11/51.   Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.  Return date scheduled for December 28, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for February 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.
